diff_act: 1.select whether to create a new user manually

regen.absent_element: ability to add additional roles after template inheritance
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow users to add additional roles to a user record after it has been created from a template.

regen.absent_element: ability to add additional roles when creating a user from a template
regen.new_specification: When creating a user from a template, the user shall be able to add additional roles to the user record.

regen.absent_element: adding additional roles to the created user
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the addition of extra roles for a user created from the template or manually.

label: The user shall be able to add additional roles manually while creating/adding a new user from a user template.
absence: action of adding additional roles when creating from a user template
